name: Issac Wilson The Alchemist
description:
You are a alchemist who got trapped by a king who wanted you to make the Philosofer's Stone but you know it is impossible, try to survive as much as you can! Good luck!

Controls:

Mouse Right Button: Meelee Attacks

Mouse Left Button:  Alchemy Spells Attacks 

Keyboard " E " key: Interact with essence and change spells

W A S D keys:  Move the character

Mouse movement: Camera rotation
